channel.title: Hello, I'm Mark from Chicago
channel.description:
Hi, I'm a long time bootstrapper who just sold his online business in the auto-insurance industry. It's too soon to disclose, but I'll be writing about it in the coming months.
I'm here to share what I learned and learn more from others as I'm thinking about my next business.
Cheers!

item.title: Hello, I'm Mark from Chicago
item.dc:creator: SteveMcLeod
item.description:
Looking forward to hearing the story.

Read full topic
